actions.name: Sandtrap
actions.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user is surrounded in falling sand, gaining @Affliction[braced] 1 and gains +1 DEF, SPDEF, and EVA Stages for 3 Activations. If the weather is Dusty, the user Sets-Up and resolves Sandtrap on the same Activation.

Resolution: On their next Activation, they attack with and resolve this attack. If the weather is not Dusty, Windy, or Clear, this attack's Power is reduced by 50%.
